thumb.title: KORG drumlogue unboxing
thumb.description: 安いときに買ったdrumlogueを開封しました。シーケンサー含め直感的に使いやすく、ループモードが楽しいです。ユーザーシンセをダウンロードしてモノシンセのように扱うこともでき、幅広さを感じます。0:00 unboxing2:05 demo song11:05 checking functions26:53 with MIDI keyboardGears: - KORG drumlogue - KORG nanokey fold (as MIDI keyboard) - zoom livetrakL6I opened a drumlogue I bought when it was cheap.It is intuitive and easy to use, including the sequencer, and the loop mode is fun.You can also download user synths and treat it like a monosynth, which gives it a wide range.My X (Twitter): https://twitter.com/haori_chiratoinstagram: https://www.instagram.com/haori.chirato/
